about_the_game:
The NecroDancer's back in an all-new rhythm game! Dragged into a strange new world, Cadence must engage in musical combat with monsters pouring through the Rift! Master each monster’s unique movements in pulse-pounding Rhythm Rifts from EASY to IMPOSSIBLE, all set to an electrifying original soundtrack by Danny Baranowsky & friends.

Crush hordes of classic NecroDancer baddies as they surge from the Rhythm Rift. Each monster has unique movements like bats that shift lanes when attacked, and tougher foes take multiple hits to dispatch!

Demo features:

  • Showstopping Music: Four original Rhythm Rift tracks you'll be humming for weeks.

  • Choose Your Intensity: Four difficulty levels in each Rhythm Rift - EASY, MEDIUM, HARD and IMPOSSIBLE.

  • Race to the Top: Climb your way to the top of global leaderboards.

The full game will feature 30+ Rhythm Rift tracks at launch from Danny Baranowsky, FamilyJules, Alex Moukala, Josie Brechner, Sam Webster, and Nick Nausbaum, with more on the way.
